reviews.review: Лучшая игра когда ставишь 2 портала друг перед другом и бегаешь в кладовке кросс. 10 физруков из 10
jogo surpriendentemento bom, com final foda
盗版补完，还有1最后的机器人我好像没过关，2代倒是容易多了
böle oyun yok be kardeşim helal beee

Great game. The use of Portals is expanded upon from the previous title, introducing unique ways to solve puzzles. The story  is really well done; I've gone back multiple times to listen to it again. It's almost like a movie, but at the same time you're solving puzzles.
Игра, которая покорила своей идеей. Ей нет достойных аналогов. Определённо лучшая игра от Valve.
V社天马行空的作品！
ahuenno
Ты чудовище!!!
O melhor jogo puzzle

Buena historia con uno de los mejores malos de los juegos :). Puzzles mas complicados y mejorados respecto al portal 1. El modo coop es muy divertido. Deseando que saquen portal 3 :D.
Más hroas de juego que el primero. Recomendable 100%. Es uno de los juegos para toda la vida y su "carismatico malo".
Интересный геймплей и сюжет. Так же хорошо поиграть в нее вместе с другом и проверить на сколько у вас слаженная работа и ум.
Velmi dobře graficky spracovaná hra. Hrál jsem Portal 2 necelou hodinu a musím říct že jsem maximálně spokojený. Tato hra má dokonce i nějakou tu příběhovou část. Určitě doporučuji !
Este juego es de mis favoritos por los desafíos que enfrenta.

just buy it if you didnt play it yet

Ну что я могу сказать? Игра отличная. Заставляет и мозг работать, и чувство юмора в ней есть. 
Так что, если вы хотите, чтобы игра вас оскорбляла, то вам сюда

Безумно люблю эту игру!!! Интересный сюжет, умодробящие головоломки, интересные персонажи, возможность пережить историю других персонажей со своим другом! Люблю ее^^
Zeer aan bevolen. Tegek

Dieses Spiel ist die perfekte Zusammensetztung aus Puzzel, Knobel und Humor. Es macht Spaß nach der Schule den PC anzumachen und neben dem Schulstress einfach mit Knobelaufgaben, den Druck, der Schule abzulassen.
Kurz gesagt es ist eiunfach perfekt für kleine Crecks und Nerds die was im köpfchen haben, wie ich ; )
Mit freundlichen Grüßen Nick aka IceFrezz99
really really really nice game, some riddles were pretty hard but still very good
Mega Spiel
Очередной маст хэв...

It's been many years since the release of this game and every time I open it I still feel that tingly sensation on my back which occurs only when something exciting is about to happen.

Love the voices, love the acting, love the concept, love the puzzles.

Portal 2 will always remain my all time favorite!

Missed it out on launch, i think its the best time to play this game. 
Memery has gone, writing and design hold up.
Did not hear about those developers studio before this game, i wonder if they keep doing projects like that.
Je m'en lasse pas !
Es un juego bastante bueno y maravilloso con buena narrativa tambien algo un poco desafiante, claramente lo recomiendo
The best game, with very cute antagonists and beautiful story.

W trybie jednoosobowym czeka nas wiele wyzwań, ciekawa fabuła, dość dobra oprawa graficzna oraz zgryźliwe komentarze "GLaDOS"z których można się pośmiać. Jest to genialna gra dla 2 osób wymagająca współpracy, zgrania, dobrego refleksu oraz logicznego myślenia. Gra sprawia wiele przyjemności zarówno w trybie single player jak i multi player. Polecam zagrać każdemu.
луна

One of the greatest games ever made, it builds on every single aspect of the original Portal, whilst still adding new ideas and features none of which are not used to their full potential.

Possibly the only true 10/10 game.

Jeu iconnique de puzzle ambiance dans l'univers riche et sombre de Half Life. Must have, je l'ai sur toute mes consoles et sur PC, Le multijoueur est très agréable et crée un étrange clivelage entre vos amis et vos <<amis>>. Je recomande égallement portal 1, vous pouvez le trouver dans the orange box ou en bundle avec le 2 :) bien que beaucoup plus court, le premier opus vaux la peine d'être joué avant le 2

Initiating surprise in 3.. 2.. 1... Just play it. GladOS needs someone to pick on.

Really, it does.

I played and finished this game the day it launched and it still blows my mind how perfectly constructed it is.The whole way through you are being guided, taught and reprogrammed to think as the game would have you to. By the time you reach the end you're reacting to events almost without consious thought and in one instance entirely by instinct. When I realized that I had instantly responded to a situation with knowledge I didn't know I had the game went from being simply amazing to being one of my favorite games of all time.

Решил поиграть с другом,зашли на 5 минут в игру.

Теперь у меня нет друга.

I haven't played it a lot yet, but it's a fantastic game. I didn't expect too much from it, but I was very surprized whit how nice this game is. The gameplay is nice, the puzzles are nice, and the graphics look really good for a game that is almost 7 years old.

非常喜欢！
打折的时候入的，独特的背景设定，氛围非常到位，与npc的互动很有趣，操作不难但是却创造出了无数多种玩法
它总会在你觉得“差不多也就这种程度了吧”的时候给你更大的惊喜！
联机模式也很赞，和基友互坑哈哈哈哈！

One of of my favorite sequels. Great gameplay and humor. Co-op is a must-play.
Порталы это чётко

I adore the game, mods, community test chambers and just the entire Portal series in general. This game applies thinking and has a very well planned story line. The characters are superb and Valve goes as far to make a cube ith a heart an iconic symbol in Portal and Portal 2. If you have not gotten this game, take some time off your day whn you can and play through both portal games. 10/10.
